yasserf.name: Yasser Fadl
yasserf.bio: Yasser comes out of Egypt, got a bit sunburnt and now enjoys the calmer weather in Berlin. Core team member of deepstream.io and enjoys soldering cupholders.

wolframhempel.name: Wolfram Hempel
wolframhempel.bio: Wolfram worked all over the world before settling in Berlin and becoming a co-founder of deepstreamHub. He also once studied art-history, but that's a different story and shall be told another time.
